cnbc.summary: The project will add 1.3 gigawatts of capacity across new data centers, with Amazon expected to break ground in 2026.

cnbc.summary: Senior U.S. District Judge Cameron Currie ruled that Lindsey Halligan, the interim U.S. attorney who brought both indictments, was invalidly appointed.

cnbc.title: Michael Burry launches newsletter to lay out his AI bubble views after deregistering hedge fund

cnbc.title: AI super PAC launches $10 million campaign pushing 'uniform' national policy

cnbc.title: New Jersey deli fraudsters fail to pay millions of dollars in restitution, judge says
